title: LET Lab receives multi-year grant for human-AI collaboration research
description: Our team was awarded a new grant to explore trustworthy AI for healthcare decision support systems.

title: New publication accepted at ACM CHI
description: Congratulations to the Interactive Systems group for their paper on explainable user interfaces.

title: Welcome our 2025 cohort of graduate researchers
description: We are excited to welcome six new graduate students joining the lab this semester.
